A bit about me

Bio

My name is Dawson Etheredge. I grew up in the midwest USA and have always had a passion for games and the stories they could tell.
 When I'm not working on a game or expanding my coding knowledge I love to read, create pixel art, play Dungeons & Dragons, practice the drums / ukelele and make latte art.

Core Qualifications

Why would you want to hire me?

  • Experience in many aspects of game development, including designing, programming, the art pipe-line, prototyping, and debugging.
  • Specialization in C# and knowledge of Java, JSON, CSS, and HTML.
  • Great analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Eye for detail.
  • Strong communication skills
  • Ability to work as part of a team to meet a common goal.
